rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a welcoming reception area. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entry door in the northeast direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A Mediterranean-inspired living room with high ceilings and expansive windows to let natural light. Vastu compliant by having the seating area towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a view of the garden. Aligning dining space in the northeast for auspicious dining.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen designed with Mediterranean finishes and ample storage. Vastu guidelines ensure that the kitchen is located in a suitable zone.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Supporting room for laundry and additional pantry space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with a small ensuite bathroom. Located in the west wing following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: An expansive master suite with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet, oriented towards the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace integrated into the living area, positioned in a quiet corner following Vastu principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A large arched door with decorative Mediterranean detailing, placed in the northeast to align with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Large windows along the east and north walls for ample natural light. In keeping with Mediterranean aesthetics and Vastu, these openings are designed to enhance air circulation.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A small balcony adjacent to the living room providing an outdoor view and garden access. Vastu compliant with eastern orientation.

garage.name: Two-Car Garage
garage.description: A dedicated two-car garage integrated into the ground floor, positioned on the south side to ensure efficient access and minimal noise interference.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is expanded with a private terrace and an ensuite bathroom. The layout respects Vastu by orienting the bed towards the north.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A large bedroom designed for family use with sufficient closet space. Oriented in the west as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort with a dedicated balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the east to maintain positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: An additional bedroom to accommodate extended family members or guests, oriented towards the northeast for Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A central bathroom serving all rooms, designed with modern fixtures and natural stone finishes. Placed in a corner to adhere to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony/Veranda
openings.description: A well-designed veranda that overlooks the garden and provides an outdoor seating area. Vastu compliant by facing east.

levels.description: This level represents the garden and outdoor living space integrated with the cottage design. It features a large landscaped garden with Mediterranean-style pathways, water features, and seating areas.

openings.name: Outdoor Terrace
openings.description: An expansive terrace connecting the first floor to the garden, offering panoramic views and open-air dining options.

vastu_compliance_notes: Main entrance is aligned in the northeast direction for welcoming positive energy.
Living and master bedrooms are oriented towards the east to ensure a refreshing start of the day.
Kitchen is placed on the south side to maintain balance with dining areas located in the northeast.
